response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense value to me and represents a significant investment in its development and creation. Considering its exceptional qualities and the time dedicated to its refinement, I am extending an exclusive offer to you.

I propose that you consider purchasing this product for $2,000,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential impact and benefits it could bring to you. I understand that such an investment is substantial, and I am confident that the value it will provide to you justifies the cost.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to provide you with all the information necessary to make an informed decision.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
